bug.summary: Methods of the KeyPoint class are not documented

<denchmark-h:h2>Methods of the KeyPoint class are not documented</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>The KeyPoint class contains some useful methods: hash, convert, overlap. However, they are not present in the documentation. </denchmark-code>
